title: A Future Unknown
description: A multimedia capstone film exploring existential dread, generational absurdity, and simulated realities. Blends dark satire with poetic transitions and lo-fi cyberpunk vibes.

title: Red Echo
description: An interactive transmedia story set in 1997 Brooklyn. Combines ArcGIS, glitch animations, custom arcade games, and a looping conspiracy you can't quite shake.

title: Winging It in Michigan
description: A podcast episode from the Birding with Brian series. Birds, humor, and heartfelt moments—built from friendship, ambient sound, and one very sketchy owl.

title: Experimental Shorts & Archives
description: Various film festival entries, chopped-and-screwed sound collages, and animated GIF loops salvaged from obsolete formats. Pure weird joy.
